description: The AWS::Logs::Destination resource specifies a CloudWatch Logs destination. A destination encapsulates a physical resource (such as an Amazon Kinesis data stream) and enables you to subscribe that resource to a stream of log events.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., :, /, =, +, - and @.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., :, /, =, +, - and @.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., :, /, =, +, - and @.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., :, /, =, +, - and @.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

DestinationName.description: The name of the destination resource
DestinationName.markdownDescription:
The name of the destination resource

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: ^[^:*]{1,512}$  
Update requires: Replacement

DestinationPolicy.description: An IAM policy document that governs which AWS accounts can create subscription filters against this destination.
DestinationPolicy.markdownDescription:
An IAM policy document that governs which AWS accounts can create subscription filters against this destination.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.description: The ARN of an IAM role that permits CloudWatch Logs to send data to the specified AWS resource
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of an IAM role that permits CloudWatch Logs to send data to the specified AWS resource

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Update requires: No interruption

TargetArn.description: The ARN of the physical target where the log events are delivered (for example, a Kinesis stream)
TargetArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the physical target where the log events are delivered (for example, a Kinesis stream)

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Update requires: No interruption
